https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2vDlbs0hYiQKAqzVW2MpsVBIy7W.jpg Anna is 60 and her acting heyday is now behind her. She lives on her own but has a friend and confidant in her downstairs neighbour Michel, who is also single. Reluctantly, Anna accepts a job as a language coach for 17-year-old Adrian who has a speech impediment and is something of a misfit. She recognises him as the boy who recently snatched her handbag in the street. A E I O U – A Quick Alphabet of Love
